project_Overview.project_Purpose: To provide users with a web application for managing their tasks.
project_Overview.product_Scope: A web application allowing users to create, manage, and track their to-do items.  The scope is limited to basic task creation and management functionalities.

functional_Requirements.title: Task Creation
functional_Requirements.description: Users shall be able to create new tasks with a title.
acceptance_criteria: A user can input a task title into a designated field.
The system stores the new task and displays it in the task list.

functional_Requirements.title: Task Viewing
functional_Requirements.description: Users shall be able to view a list of their created tasks.
acceptance_criteria: A list of tasks, each identified by its title, is displayed to the user.

non_Functional_Requirements.description: The application should have a user-friendly interface.
acceptance_criteria: The application is intuitive and easy to navigate.

non_Functional_Requirements.description: Basic security measures should be implemented.
acceptance_criteria: The application should be free from obvious vulnerabilities.

non_Functional_Requirements.description: The application should perform with acceptable speed.
acceptance_criteria: Page load times should be reasonable.

communication_Interfaces: HTTP for communication between client and server

assumptions_Made: Assumed basic user authentication is not required.
Assumed tasks only require a title for the MVP.
Assumed a simple SQL database is sufficient for this simple application.
Assumed a responsive design is necessary for a web application.

metadata.original_description: create for me a to-do web app
